name: Coil: Electromagnetic Energy Game. Have fun with energy fields and electromagnetism !
name_original: Coil: Electromagnetic Energy Game. Have fun with energy fields and electromagnetism !
description:
Awesome simple fun ! No ads, No in-app purchases, just the Game .

Move fast , run circles around the orbs to capture/pop them, gain bonus points by getting multiple orbs at once, without getting the red ones !

Enclose the blue orbs before they explode, avoid the red ones !

When you circle multiple blue or pulsating yellow orbs (without getting red ones) you multiplier increases!
